name: ESC (terriv)
description:
ESC was the first game I ever "completed", back in 2013. Re-uploaded here on ITCH.IO, completely unupdated!

How to play:

Protect the ESC key from attackers who want to shut the game down.
Use arrow keys to move ESC.
Press attacker's respective key to smash it.
Run the game for as long as you can.

V0.1 060713
